title: Bulk create media accounts
fileUploadText: Upload a csv file containing a list of media accounts to be created.
recordDescription: Each record must include the email, first name and surname information.
fileHeaderDescription: The file must also have the header 'email,firstName,surname'.
accountCountLimitDescription: Note the upload process has a maximum of 30 accounts created per run. Please ensure the file uploaded for processing has no more than 30 cases.

fileUploadErrors.typeError: Please upload a valid file format
fileUploadErrors.sizeError: File too large, please upload a file smaller than 2MB
fileUploadErrors.fieldSizeError: Incorrect number of fields in file
fileUploadErrors.tooManyAccountsError: Too many accounts, please upload a file with 30 accounts or less
